sentences: Lubage, et ma olukorda pisut selgitan!
Ma juba mõtlesin, et mis see koer küll haugub.
context: The word 'selgitan' is the 1st person singular present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'selgitama', which means to explain or make something clear. It is used when someone wants to provide clarification, explanation, or details about a situation or topic. The word can be conjugated in different forms depending on the subject and tense.
